dct_title_s: The Federation of Russian States oil & gas activity and concession map : 2007 / Clarkson Research Services Limited
dct_description_sm: Depths shown by bathymetric isolines. Map shows onshore/offshore petroleum/gas fields, refineries, pipelines, tanker terminals, and limits of polar ice. Includes notes, color illustrations, and advertisements. Insets: A. Sakhalin Island [northern] -- B. [Northwestern Caspian Sea region] -- [Pacific coast of Asia showing potential shipping routes from Sakhalin Island to the south] -- [Russian Far East].
dct_subject_sm: Oil and gas leases—Former Soviet republics—Maps
Liquefied natural gas shipping terminals—Former Soviet republics—Maps
